attributes.action: Standardised Made in Britain logo that can be used by all businesses manufacturing in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We would like there to be a standardised Made in Britain logo, similar to the red tractor logo that is used on foods, that can be used across all consumer goods indicating that a significant proportion of a product has been made in Britain.
It would also indicate that the labelled product has been made to certain standards and that its supply chain is traceable.

At present there is no recognisable or standardised Made in Britain logo that can be used across all industries in order that the consumer can easily identify products that can be assured to have been made in the UK.

This is not about advocating a compulsory labelling policy, but about giving businesses the option to market their products as manufactured in the UK, should they so wish, in a manner that is instantly recognisable to the consumer.
